import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../App.css' import axios from 'axios' class showBookDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { user: {}, } } componentDidMount() { // console.log("Print id: " + this.props.match.params.id); axios .get('http://localhost:8082/api/books/' + this.props.match.params.id) .then((res) => { // console.log("Print-showBookDetails-API-response: " + res.data); this.setState({ book: res.data, }) }) .catch((err) => { console.log('Error from ShowBookDetails') }) } onDeleteClick(id) { axios .delete('http://localhost:8082/api/books/' + id) .then((res) => { this.props.history.push('/') }) .catch((err) => { console.log('Error form ShowBookDetails_deleteClick') }) } render() { const book = this.state.book let BookItem = (
{/* */}
# First Last Handle
1 Title {book.title}
2 Author {book.author}
3 ISBN {book.isbn}
4 Publisher {book.publisher}
5 Published Date {book.published_date}
6 Description {book.description}
) return (

) } } export default showBookDetails
